snippet: BEGUN--Martin S. We have lost a very special friend and the world has lost a unique person. We will miss him always. Love to Louise and the family. The Postel Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. We have lost a very special friend and the world has lost a unique person. We will miss him always. Love to Louise and the family. The Postel Family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
